nodes.text: The Brothers of Barbeen were a group from the planet Barbeen who wore the superconductive material ultrachrome. They received a brief mention in Jedi Battlemaster Skarch Vaunk's "Lightsaber countermeasures" section of the Jedi training manual The Jedi Path, which was published in around 990 BBY.
The Brothers of Barbeen were first mentioned in The Jedi Path: A Manual for Students of the Force, a book written by Daniel Wallace and published in 2014.
